Gatherer:Centralize.NAME: Centralize
Gatherer:Centralize.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! card from draw pile and place it into your hand. NL Once: Upgrade it for the combat.
Gatherer:Centralize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! cards from draw pile and place them into your hand. NL Once: Upgrade them for the combat.

Gatherer:SpareBottle.NAME: Spare Bottle
Gatherer:SpareBottle.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use a Potion, gain !M! Block and deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

Gatherer:FlowerPower.NAME: Flower Power
Gatherer:FlowerPower.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Weak, Frail, and Vulnerable. At the start of your turn, Draw !M! cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Weak and Frail. At the start of your turn, Draw !M! cards.
Gain !M! Weak. At the start of your turn, Draw !M! cards.
At the start of your turn, Draw !M! cards.

Gatherer:SacredSoil.NAME: Sacred Soil
Gatherer:SacredSoil.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When obtained, upgrade ALL your Flower cards.

Gatherer:SolarBeam.NAME: Solar Beam
Gatherer:SolarBeam.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade ALL your Flower cards for the combat. Deal !M! damage for each of them. Exhaust.
Gatherer:SolarBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Upgrade ALL your Flower cards for the combat. Deal !M! damage for each of them. Exhaust.

Gatherer:CollectorsShot.NAME: Collector's Shot
Gatherer:CollectorsShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! X number of unique cards with 2 or more copies in your deck.

Gatherer:Bulldoze.NAME: Bulldoze
Gatherer:Bulldoze.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if there are !M! unique cards in your discard pile. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: unique cards in my discard pile.

Gatherer:FruitForce.NAME: Fruit Force
Gatherer:FruitForce.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! % of Max HP. When obtained, raise your Max HP by 4.

Gatherer:MagicLamp.NAME: Magic Lamp
Gatherer:MagicLamp.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. When obtained, add Light! and Shadow! to your deck.
Gatherer:MagicLamp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. When obtained, add Light! and Shadow! to your deck.

Gatherer:Light.NAME: Light!
Gatherer:Light.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you play Shadow! as the next card, it deals double damage.

Gatherer:Shadow.NAME: Shadow!
Gatherer:Shadow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you play Light! as the next card, it gains double Block.

Gatherer:CoupDeGrace.NAME: Coup De Grace
Gatherer:CoupDeGrace.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If targetâ€™s current HP was less than yours, hit twice instead.

Gatherer:FirstAidKit.NAME: First-Aid Kit
Gatherer:FirstAidKit.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a First-Aid Potion to your Sack. It heals !M! % of missing HP. NL Exhaust.
Gatherer:FirstAidKit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Obtain a First-Aid Potion+ to your Sack. It heals !M! % of missing HP. NL Exhaust.

Gatherer:TreeGrowth.NAME: Tree Growth
Gatherer:TreeGrowth.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Block 2 turns later.

Gatherer:CarefulStrike.NAME: Careful Strike
Gatherer:CarefulStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. You may put !M! card on top of your deck.

Gatherer:TrickStyle.NAME: Trick Style
Gatherer:TrickStyle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Retain. When Retained, it switches between Attack and Skill.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Retain. When Retained, it switches between Attack and Skill.

Gatherer:Snatch.NAME: Snatch
Gatherer:Snatch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Once: Obtain a random lesser potion to your Sack.

Gatherer:QuickSynthesis.NAME: Quick Synthesis
Gatherer:QuickSynthesis.DESCRIPTION: Obtain !M! random lesser potion to your Sack. NL Exhaust.
Gatherer:QuickSynthesis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Obtain !M! random lesser potion to your Sack. NL Exhaust.

Gatherer:FlamingBottle.NAME: Flaming Bottle
Gatherer:FlamingBottle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Obtain a Lesser Fire Potion to your Sack.

Gatherer:PoisonMastery.NAME: Poison Mastery
Gatherer:PoisonMastery.DESCRIPTION: Obtain !M! Lesser Poison Potion to your Sack. Poison damage is increased by 100% this combat.
Gatherer:PoisonMastery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Obtain !M! Lesser Poison Potion to your Sack. Poison damage is increased by 100% this combat.

Gatherer:Pollute.NAME: Pollute
Gatherer:Pollute.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, Apply !M! Poison, Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

Gatherer:Herbalism.NAME: Herbalism
Gatherer:Herbalism.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for each card in your hand with 2 or more cost.

Gatherer:GatherMaterial.NAME: Gather Material
Gatherer:GatherMaterial.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. Gain !B! Block for each Attack card drawn.

Gatherer:Convert.NAME: Convert
Gatherer:Convert.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. If it is an uncommon or rare card, gain !B! Block.

Gatherer:SecretPlan.NAME: Secret Plan
Gatherer:SecretPlan.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Retain up to !M! card this turn.
Gatherer:SecretPlan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Retain up to !M! cards this turn.

Gatherer:WoolGloves.NAME: Wool Gloves
Gatherer:WoolGloves.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Once: Draw 3 cards, then discard 2 cards.

Gatherer:Salvage.NAME: Salvage
Gatherer:Salvage.DESCRIPTION: Choose up to !M! cards from your discard pile. Shuffle them into your draw pile.

Gatherer:HarmonicSymbol.NAME: Harmonic Symbol
Gatherer:HarmonicSymbol.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. Deal !D! Damage X times.

Gatherer:LastResort.NAME: Last Resort
Gatherer:LastResort.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to half of your missing HP.
Gatherer:LastResort.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 6+ half of your missing HP.

Gatherer:Fruitify.NAME: Fruitify
Gatherer:Fruitify.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills a non-minion enemy, raise your Max HP by !M!. Exhaust.

Gatherer:SalvePotion.NAME: Salve Potion
Gatherer:SalvePotion.DESCRIPTION: Considered as using a Potion. Heal !M! HP. Decrease this card's healing by 1 this combat.

Gatherer:BronzeBlade.NAME: Bronze Blade
Gatherer:BronzeBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Play a basic Defend from your hand with no cost.

Gatherer:GlassHammer.NAME: Glass Hammer
Gatherer:GlassHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deal !M! damage to a random enemy other than the target.

Gatherer:AcidicSpray.NAME: Acidic Spray
Gatherer:AcidicSpray.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each debuff on the target. Apply !M! Weak.

Gatherer:FrenzyWhip.NAME: Frenzy Whip
Gatherer:FrenzyWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.

Gatherer:RustyPipe.NAME: Rusty Pipe
Gatherer:RustyPipe.DESCRIPTION: Deal ? damage. NL Apply ?. NL Effects are randomly determined for each card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Effects are randomly determined for each card.

Gatherer:WitheringStrike.NAME: Withering Strike
Gatherer:WitheringStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Enemy loses 1 Strength down to !M!.

Gatherer:VenomBarrier.NAME: Venom Barrier
Gatherer:VenomBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply !M! Poison to the attacker.

Gatherer:Transmute.NAME: Transmute
Gatherer:Transmute.DESCRIPTION: Transform a card from your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

Gatherer:BalancedGrowth.NAME: Balanced Growth
Gatherer:BalancedGrowth.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Strength or Dexterity until they are equal.

Gatherer:Liquidism.NAME: Liquidism
Gatherer:Liquidism.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use a Potion, gain 1 Strength or Dexterity randomly.
Gatherer:Liquidism.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you use a Potion, gain 1 Strength or Dexterity randomly.

Gatherer:BomberForm.NAME: Bomber Form
Gatherer:BomberForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, obtain a LEP. Any incoming lesser Potion becomes LEP, and increase damage of all LEPs' by !M!.

Gatherer:SolidTechnique.NAME: Solid Technique
Gatherer:SolidTechnique.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you have !M! or more Block, gain 1 Artifact.

Gatherer:ChargingShot.NAME: Charging Shot
Gatherer:ChargingShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. While in your hand, using a Potion increases it's damage by !M! this combat.

Gatherer:SealedBomb.NAME: Sealed Bomb
Gatherer:SealedBomb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. While in your hand, using a Potion decreases it's cost by 1 this combat.

Gatherer:FeelingFine.NAME: Feeling Fine
Gatherer:FeelingFine.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use 3 Potions in a turn, remove all of your debuffs.

Gatherer:CursedBlade.NAME: Cursed Blade
Gatherer:CursedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Once: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. When Obtained, add a Curse-Normality to your deck.

Gatherer:Overflowing.NAME: Overflowing
Gatherer:Overflowing.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! energy. Energy is conserved for the next turn. NL Exhaust.

Gatherer:ScrollOfWall.NAME: Scroll Of Wall
Gatherer:ScrollOfWall.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Use a Potion to Retain this turn. All incoming Statuses are Exhausted.
Gatherer:ScrollOfWall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Use a Potion to Retain this turn. All incoming Statuses are Exhausted and make you draw 1.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Retain this turn. All incoming Statuses are Exhausted.
Unplayable. Retain this turn. All incoming Statuses are Exhausted and make you draw 1.

Gatherer:ScrollOfPurity.NAME: Scroll of Purity
Gatherer:ScrollOfPurity.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Whenever you use a Potion, you may exhaust a card and draw !M! cards.

Gatherer:Investigate.NAME: Investigate
Gatherer:Investigate.DESCRIPTION: Look at the top 3 cards of your draw pile. Play one, and discard others.

Gatherer:Uplift.NAME: Uplift
Gatherer:Uplift.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use a potion, reduce a random card's cost in your hand to 1 this turn.
Gatherer:Uplift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use a potion, reduce a random card's cost in your hand to 1 this combat.
